Package net.nexttext.renderer

Class Summary
BoundingBoxRenderer Traverses the TextObject hierarchy and draws every object's bounding box.
G2DTextPageRenderer Renders the text stored in a text page using a Graphics2D object.
G3DTextPageRenderer  
Java2DTextPageRenderer Renders the text stored in a text page.
OpenGLTextPageRenderer Renders the text stored in a TextPage as glyphs.
P2DTextPageRenderer  
P3DTextPageRenderer Renders the text stored in a text page.
TextInternalsRenderer This renderer prints out the internals of the TextPage tree to the console.
TextPageRenderer An interface that represents classes capable of rendering a TextPage in a PApplet.
VelocityRenderer Traverses the TextObject hierarchy and draws every object's velocity as a line starting from the object's position.
 

Enum Summary
G3DTextPageRenderer.RendererType Renderer type enumeration.
